func.title: CheckEnergyNeedChain
func.desc: Checks whether any energy user connected to the specified object currently requires energy. The search will also include indirectly connected objects (via multiple lines).
func.remark: The search is performed only in the direction in which energy is also transferred, meaning from suppliers to users.

example.text: Script for a power plant: if any of the connected users needs energy, the furnace is started.
